description:
Do you Run, Jog, Bike or Drive and are searching for an app to meet your workout needs? Let FitTrack ease your concerns with accurate GPS tracking and reliable live map formatting which allows you to track on the move and is displayed in a clean, easy to view interface. FitTrack, a GPS enabled application for webOS, works with your HP/Palm device to record all your workout data including the ability to save your routes, live map tracking, and live updating graphs and more. FitTrack allows you the option to upload to all your favorite fitness sites with your saved routes in GPX format.
 Want to record your workout progress to see how you’re improving? No problem with FitTrack’s straightforward menu system allowing you to save all your hard earned data and view them in an easy to understand format organized by month. For more workout details, simply tap on the particular workout you wish to view and all the collected data is displayed for your convenience. This data includes but is not limited to, speed, calories, distance, date and time.
With a customizable main display screen, you control the statistics you want to see making it personal and adaptable to your workout needs. Both Standard and Metric units are supported. FitTrack has been tested against commercial product GPS watches and found to be accurate in distance as well as velocity as long as a good signal has been acquired for the duration of your workout.

FitTrack is a Palm Hot Apps Winner. 

Features:
+ Select Workout Type 
+ Live Map (See map during workout)
+ Live Graphs (Speed & Altitude during workout)
+ Stats available in the Dashboard
+ Notifications each Mile/KM
+ Lap Splits by Mile/KM
+ Save workouts
+ View Workout Map
+ View Speed and Altitude Graphs
+ Build Posts to Social Networking
+ Export GPX+KML (Coming soon to 2.0)  
+ GPS Manager

Stats include: 
+ time 
+ pace 
+ speed
+ distance 
+ average speed & pace 
+ max speed & pace 
+ kcalories 
+ vertical travel 
+ altitude 
+ GPS accuracy
